```{r}
pounds <- ""

x <- 1
xVals <- c("")

for(y in 1:323) {
  pounds <- paste(pounds, as.character(df[y, x]), sep = "")
  x <- x + 3
  if(x > 341)
    break
  xVals <- append(xVals, as.character(x))
}

pounds

str_count(pounds, "#")
```

```{r}
df <- read.csv("../Day 3/input2.csv")
df
```

```{r}
x <- 1
pounds <- ""
xVals <- c()

for(y in 1:323) {
  pounds <- paste(pounds, as.character(df[y, x]), sep = "")
  if(x + 3 > 31)
    x <- x + 3 - 31
  else
    x <- x + 3
  xVals <- append(xVals, as.character(x))
}

pounds
xVals
str_count(pounds, "#")
```
